Windlord::

"Thanks"said Windlord"I don't know if we will survive this time... 
Please, tell Iron Raptor our situation, I just beg that... Friend "

Windlord ran towards the exit, he took off and transform to his mini 
jet mode and flew towards Chivtron base.
